panels.description: The responses grouped by HTTP status type (2xx, 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx) for a node.

targets.expr: sum by(instance, couchdb_cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", code=~"2.*"}[$__interval:])) != 0
sum by(instance, couchdb_cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", code=~"3.*"}[$__interval:])) != 0
sum by(instance, couchdb_cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", code=~"4.*"}[$__interval:])) != 0
sum by(instance, couchdb_cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", code=~"5.*"}[$__interval:])) != 0
